quotes.Quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.Quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.

quotes.Quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.

quotes.Quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.

quotes.Quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is, nothing is a miracle. The other is, everything is a miracle.
